name: Delicious.io
description:
Super addictive .io arcade game Delicious.io comes now!

Multiplayer control balls real-time in Delicious City. Eat everything up, including each other! Eat, grow bigger, and survive, simple enough.

Game Features

>>>Classic easy .io gameplay
Control your ball and eat smaller delicious things to grow big, while avoiding being eaten by bigger ones. Battle with wisdom, agile, courage and luck. Try to survive and you’ll be awarded according to how big you are.

>>>Skin & Tail system
Meet requirements to unlock new skins and trails for your ball. There’re many customizing options for you, both skins and tails. Eat everything and look unique!

>>>Expected updates
Constant big updates will happen here in Delicious Land! New ball skins, new tails, new city maps, or even new game modes are on the way.

Stay hungry, stay foolish. So just don’t. Come to Decilious.io and eat something or everything!

Contact us: delicious.io@polymergame.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Deliciousio
